charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 21:841(b)(1)POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to counts I and III of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 46 months on each count I and III to be served concurrently; the defendant should be given credit for time served since April 26, 2012; 4 years supervised release on count I and 3 years on count III to run concurrent; $200 Special Assessment

Defendant pleaded guilty to counts I and III of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 46 months on each count I and III to be served concurrently; the defendant should be given credit for time served since April 26, 2012; 4 years supervised release on count I and 3 years on count III to run concurrent; $200 Special Assessment
Counts II and IV of the Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only.
Counts II and IV of the Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only.
